question: Cricket: Who will win Sri Lanka vs. Australia, 1st Test WTC?
description:
Test cricket is a format of cricket with the longest match duration and is considered the game's highest standard. Test matches are played between national representative teams that have been granted Test status (by the International Cricket Council) and may last up to five days.

The 2021–2023 ICC World Test Championship (WTC) started on August 4 2021 and is scheduled to finish on March 31 2023. New Zealand are the defending champions.

This market will resolve to whichever national team wins the WTC's 1st Test game Sri Lanka vs. Australia scheduled to commence on June 29, 2022, 12:30 AM ET.

If the game is declared to be tied, abandoned, has "no result" or doesn't finish before July 10, 2022, 11:59:59 PM ET - this market will resolve 50-50.

question: Will Jalen Brunson join the Knicks for the 2022-23 NBA season?
description:
The Dallas Mavericks have stated they intend to sign Jalen Brunson again for the National Basketball Association's (NBA) 2022-23 season. The New York Knicks, however, have also indicated an interest in signing Mr. Brunson.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Jalen Brunson plays with the New York Knicks for at least 1 of the first 3 games of the New York Knicks' 2022-23 NBA regular season.

If the Knicks have played their first 3 games in the 2022-23 NBA regular season and Jalen Brunson has not played for the Knicks in any of them, this market will resolve to "No".

If for any reason the Knicks have not played at least 3 games in the 2022-23 NBA regular season by December 31, 2022, 11:59:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the NBA (e.g. https://www.nba.com/player/1628973/jalen-brunson), however credible reporting may be used.

question: Will an FTX acquisition of Robinhood be announced by September 20?
description:
On Monday, June 27, 2022, Bloomberg News reported that the crypto exchange FTX was considering acquiring the trading app Robinhood. Citing people familiar with the matter, Bloomberg reported that FTX had been discussing a takeover plan internally, however no offer had yet been made to Robinhood. As of June 27, Sam Bankman-Fried (CEO of FTX) denies the report and Robinhood has not commented.

This is a market on whether Robinhood Markets, Inc. (HOOD) announces it will be acquired by FTX, or FTX announces it will acquire Robinhood Markets, Inc. by September 20, 2022. 

For the purpose of resolving this market, only announcements from Robinhood or FTX that one or the other or both are agreeing to an acquisition or merger will be sufficient to resolve this market to “Yes”. If Robinhood announces by September 20, 2022, 11:59:59 PM ET that it will be acquired by FTX, or acquired by or merged with any entity controlled by FTX, it will be sufficient to resolve this market to “Yes” regardless of whether that acquisition or merger takes place within or outside of the timeframe of this market. If FTX, or any entity controlled by FTX, announces by September 20, 2022, 11:59:59 PM ET that it will acquire or merge with Robinhood, it will be sufficient to resolve this market to "Yes" regardless of whether that acquisition or merger takes place within or outside of the timeframe of this market. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If Robinhood or FTX announces it will no longer agree to the terms of its initial agreement or announcement after previously announcing an agreement to an acquisition of Robinhood by FTX, or an acquisition of Robinhood by or merger of Robinhood with any entity controlled by FTX, it will have no bearing on the resolution of this market. This market will resolve to "Yes" solely based on whether an initial announcement is made that Robinhood will be acquired by FTX, or acquired by or merged with any entity controlled by FTX.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from Robinhood and FTX (e.g. https://twitter.com/RobinhoodApp, https://twitter.com/FTX_Official, https://help.ftx.com/hc/en-us/sections/4414757143188-Announcements, https://blog.robinhood.com/, etc.); however, other credible reporting may be used to resolve this market.

question: Will FTX's deal with BlockFi be announced by July 31?
description:
On June 21, 2022, BlockFi International Ltd, a global crypto financial services company, announced that the company signed a preliminary term sheet with FTX to secure a $250 million revolving line of credit providing BlockFi with access to further capital. Zac Prince, the CEO of BlockFi, confirmed the news in a Twitter thread, claiming the new flow of capital would bolster the firm’s balance sheet and strengthen the platform. However, the term sheet is contingent upon the execution of definitive documents, which is expected to be completed in the coming days.

This market is on whether the credit deal between FTX and BlockFi will be announced by July 31, 2022.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if, within this market's timeframe, FTX (FTX Trading Ltd or FTX Digital Markets Ltd) or any of its subsidiaries or BlockFi Lending LLC or any of its subsidiaries announce that the two parties have reached an agreement in which FTX provides to BlockFi a line of credit greater than or equal to $100 million, in accordance with the aforementioned preliminary term sheet. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”. 

For this market to resolve to "Yes", either party need only announce within this market's timeframe that FTX has agreed to provide a line of credit greater than or equal to $100 million to BlockFi, regardless of whether the transaction has been initiated or completed at the time it is announced. Acquisition, exchange for equity, or another type of the deal which is not a revolving line of credit as described on June 21 by BlockFi, will not qualify for this market to resolve to “Yes”. 

This market's timeframe spans from June 29, 2022, 11 PM ET to July 31, 2022, 11:59:59 PM ET (inclusive).

An announcement by BlockFi or FTX must be made through any of their official or verified channels (e.g. https://blockfi.com/learn/blockfi-news, https://twitter.com/BlockFi, https://twitter.com/FTX_Official, &c.), as a recorded or written statement by either company’s CEO, legal representation, or other individual or team which officially represents either company. A consensus of credible reporting may also be used to determine whether either company has issued such an announcement.

If any subsidiary or parent of FTX Trading Ltd, FTX Digital Markets Ltd, or BlockFi Lending LLC announces that FTX will extend a credit facility to BlockFi by the resolution date, it will suffice to resolve this market to "Yes".
